message.name: ERR_ANNOTATED_ITEM_MUST_BE_RULE_SET
message.locale: This annotation can only be present on a rule set.

message.name: ERR_ANNOTATED_ITEM_MUST_BE_RULE_CLASS
message.locale: This annotation can only be present on a rule class.

message.name: ERR_PRIMARY_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_DECLARED_DIRECTLY_ON_RULES_CLASS
message.locale: The primary attribute '%1s' is inherited by rule class '%2s' - only an attribute declared directly on the rule class may be marked as primary.
